prompts.text:
Gemini Image Editing Prompt:
Use my uploaded photo as the main subject and keep my face 100% natural and unchanged.
Create a simple, clean, and elegant couple-style photo in a beautiful natural environment.
Add one modest girl standing with me, respectful and graceful pose. The scene should be calm and classy, not dramatic.
Environment:
A soft, beautiful outdoor setting filled with fresh roses and flowers, greenery, and a peaceful romantic-but-decent vibe.
Pose & Interaction:
The girl is gently holding my blazer sleeve or arm with both hands, in a sweet and respectful couple pose (no hugging, no intimacy).
My Outfit:
Traditional shalwar kameez
Stylish blazer
Sports sneakers
One hand naturally visible in a relaxed pose
Girlâ€™s Outfit:
Simple, elegant dress (modest fashion)
Soft natural makeup
Hair neat and graceful
Style & Quality:
High-resolution, DSLR-quality image
Natural lighting
Soft colors
Realistic skin tones
Clean background with roses clearly visible
Overall look should feel pure, classy, and aesthetic, like a beautiful couple portrait, not cinematic or dramatic.
